Subject: Exporting report to specific path
Description:
Hello,

Solution_Comment__c:
sorry for the late answer.
The error was due to a certificate problem linked to my SMTP server.
Once the certificate is installed on the server running pingcastle, sending mail works. 
So, I mean you archive this case now
